content: The Act may be cited as the "Venture Capital Gains and Growth Act of 2001" and includes modifications applicable to qualified small business stock. The "Venture Capital Gains and Growth Act of 2001" includes amendments to the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. These amendments involve the repeal of minimum tax preference and an increase in the rollover period for qualified small business stock from 60 days to 180 days.
